scripts.build:packages: yarn workspaces foreach -t --include @recast-navigation/wasm --include @recast-navigation/core --include @recast-navigation/generators --include @recast-navigation/three --include recast-navigation run build
scripts.build:apps: yarn workspaces foreach -t --include navmesh-website --include docs run build
scripts.test:unit-tests: yarn workspaces foreach -t --include recast-navigation run test
scripts.test:bundlers-smoke-test: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "(cd ./examples/parcel-example && yarn build)" "(cd ./examples/react-scripts-example && yarn build)" "(cd ./examples/vite-example && yarn build)"
scripts.version: yarn changeset version && yarn install --mode update-lockfile
